name: ListProjectCollaborators
description:
Retrieve collaborators for a GitHub organization project.

Use this tool to obtain a list of all collaborators for a specified GitHub organization project, including outside collaborators and organization members with various access levels. Requires organization owner or project admin permissions.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the GitHub organization project to retrieve collaborators for.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the project.

parameters.name: collaborator_affiliation_filter
parameters.description: Specifies how to filter collaborators: `outside`, `direct`, or `all`.

value_schema.description: Filters the collaborators by their affiliation. `outside` means outside collaborators of a project that are not a member of the project's organization. `direct` means collaborators with permissions to a project, regardless of organization membership status. `all` means all collaborators the authenticated user can see.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the number of results per page, with a maximum of 100.

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: results_page_number
parameters.description: The page number to retrieve from the list of collaborators.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: affiliation
parameters.description: Filters the collaborators by their affiliation. `outside` means outside collaborators of a project that are not a member of the project's organization. `direct` means collaborators with permissions to a project, regardless of organization membership status. `all` means all collaborators the authenticated user can see.

value_schema.description: Filters the collaborators by their affiliation. `outside` means outside collaborators of a project that are not a member of the project's organization. `direct` means collaborators with permissions to a project, regardless of organization membership status. `all` means all collaborators the authenticated user can see.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

value_schema.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

value_schema.description: Page number of the results to fetch.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the project.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
